reviewtext: Let me start by saying that I have another Monster unit that protects my front room's electronics and I needed a new protector for my bedroom.  This product meets my needs; it protects a TV, Sat Box, PS3, and a hard drive enclosure.The protector is good quality and has a strong and long cord.  If you do not care that it is labeled for a VCR and don't run coaxial or telephone cable I highly recommend this product.
